Name: Redline
Text: Hahaha, first again. It certainly pays to be the fastest.

Name: Redline
Text: Like they say, time is money, and when you're the quickest in all of Banktania...

Name: Evil Bankman
Text: Ma'am! University forces are approaching the parking lot!

Name: Redline
Text: Oh no, most of my forces are still catching up!

Name: Redline
Text: In my rush I could only bring Juniors...

Name: Redline
Text: But what could a few University students do against Banktania?

Name: Redline
Text: Go find their forces! The rest of you, guard the entrance!

Name: Professor Hewel
Text: You must defeat Banktanias forces. In order to do so, you must command our troops.

Name: Professor Hewel
Text: Select a unit by bringing the cursor overtop of our BLUE troops. Select them with Z on the keyboard or left click.

Name: Professor Hewel
Text: Once they are selected you will see where they can move to. Select a spot within the blue tiles to move it to that location.

Name: Professor Hewel
Text: Once it moves, you can select a command such as wait, or attack if an enemy is close.

Name: Professor Hewel
Text: If you ever need to stop an order, press X on the keyboard or right click the menu! Don't worry, you'll be leading like a natural in no time!
